issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Use vcpkg as dependency source for manylinux and windows wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11212](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11212). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So we can pin an explicit version of the environment, preventing any issues arising from dependency sources (like conda) which drag over time.

We can also enforce static linking by installing the static libraries only.
